summary: A nameless survivor is ambushed and infected with the virus, a beautiful gift to the world.
cast: Josh Merrill|Brooke Hemsath|Joel Manwaring|William Tyler Dunkley|Brian Nuzman|Cameron Nelson|Tyson Ainge|Chris Andreasen|Zach Reinhard|Brandon Swain|Andrew Leavelle|Riley Gardiner|Skyler Haskell|Jacob Merrill|Faith Prall|Josh Vines|Natasha Danae|Brittany Parmenter|Logan Ward|McKell Banks|James Perkins|Drew Bartholomew|Kessler Walrath|Michael Ballif
title: 2 Hours
